articles.title: ‘WHOOP 5.0 Is our biggest leap yet', says founder and CEO Will Ahmed
articles.author: Gulf Business
articles.summary: WHOOP is launching WHOOP 5.0 and WHOOP MG. These new products redefine performance, longevity, and recovery.

articles.title: I Miss When Handheld Gaming Was Its Own Thing
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: Microsoft launched the ROG Xbox Ally, a handheld console designed to compete with the Switch 2. The Xbox Ally was unveiled during the Xbox showcase. The product's arrival follows the recent release of PlayStation's Portal.

articles.title: Silksong Confirmed: Xbox Portable Launch
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Team Cherry's "Hollow Knight: Silksong" is set to launch alongside Microsoft's new handheld console, the "Xbox Ally," during the 2025 holiday season. The reveal showcased the sleek design of the "Xbox Ally" while seamlessly running "Hollow Knight: Silksong," solidifying the game as a key launch title for the console.

articles.title: China's electric cars are cheaper, but is there a deeper cost?
articles.author: Theo Leggett
articles.summary: BYD launched its Dolphin Surf in Europe, aiming to compete with other low-cost electric vehicles like the Dacia Spring and Leapmotor T03. Renault is also developing its Renault 5 E-tech electric car in an effort to provide affordable EVs in Europe.

articles.title: All the Early Prime Day Deals of 2025 That You Can Shop Right Now
articles.summary: Amazon Prime Day 2025 early deals feature discounts on products from various companies. Dyson is offering deals on the Supersonic Nural Hair Dryer, while Apple has discounts on AirPods Pro 2 and Sonos on Ace Headphones. Ninja's NC300 Creami Ice Cream Maker is also included in the early deals.

articles.title: Taiwan Excellence Invites Malaysian Business to Join Hands in Creating a Better Life
articles.author: Juiceapac Web Development Team
articles.summary: Taiwan Excellence is hosting a product launch event on June 23rd, showcasing five innovative Taiwanese products. These include the HydroLight High Penetration Detox Capsule by Jian Ling Technology, the GHG Mechanical Walker by Goang Hann Enterprise, the Easy Jet Micro Handheld Fire Extinguisher by Hepty International Technology, the Carbon EnVision Carbon Management System by Systex Corporation, and the MCM plant-based metal cutting fluid by Mecom Industries Corp.

articles.title: Surviving consumer dictatorship: Loyalty is no longer guaranteed
articles.author: Dheeraj Gowrie
articles.summary: Frogfoot Networks, a fibre network operator, provides transparent services to customers with real-time service health dashboards and network upgrade roadmaps. This allows customers to easily monitor and understand the quality and future developments of the service.

articles.title: "Work smarter, not harder": Video of Target's window-washing drone divides viewers
articles.author: Whitney Jefferson
articles.summary: Target is being observed using drone technology for power washing windows at its Brooklyn location. Walmart has reportedly used drone-assisted window cleaning at its new home office campus, and Pinnacle Bank Arena has utilized the same power-washing technology. These instances indicate larger companies are testing and implementing new cleaning technologies.

articles.title: Chipotle releases 1st new dip in 5 years
articles.summary: Chipotle is launching a new product, adobo ranch, on June 17th, marking their first new dip release since 2020. This dip is a variation of classic ranch dressing seasoned with adobo pepper, sour cream, and other herbs and spices. Chipotle hopes this new product will boost sales, especially amid a slowdown in consumer spending.

articles.title: You can now try Microsoft's new Start menu for Windows 11
articles.author: Tom Warren
articles.summary: Microsoft is rolling out a new, larger, and more customizable Start menu for Windows 11 testers. This updated Start menu includes a scrollable interface, new category and grid views, and the ability to disable the recommended section to display more apps. Additionally, Microsoft has adjusted the Start menu size based on screen size and introduced a mobile device button for Phone Link interaction.

articles.title: Mountain Dew Is Releasing Two 'Exciting' Flavors This Summer
articles.author: Matt Hladik
articles.summary: Mountain Dew is launching a new Dragon Fruit flavor, blending citrus with dragon fruit sweetness, available exclusively at Walmart starting Sunday. The company is also re-releasing its Summer Freeze flavor nationwide, combining Mountain Dew's original flavor with red, white, and blue freeze pop taste. Summer Freeze is a limited-time product.

articles.title: Chipotle introduces ‘bold' new sauce, first in five years
articles.author: Carlos Mathis
articles.summary: Chipotle is launching a new Adobo Ranch sauce on June 17 at locations across the U.S. and Canada. The sauce is a smoky and spicy twist on ranch, made with adobo pepper, sour cream, and various herbs and spices. Chipotle Rewards members can receive a free offer for the new sauce with a minimum purchase of $5 on the first day.

articles.title: Chipotle introduces ‘bold' new sauce, first in five years
articles.author: Carlos Mathis
articles.summary: Chipotle is launching a new Adobo Ranch sauce at its locations across the U.S. and Canada starting June 17. The sauce is described as a smoky and spicy twist on ranch, made with adobo pepper, sour cream, and various herbs and spices. Chipotle Rewards members can receive a free offer for the new sauce with a minimum purchase of $5 on the first offering day.

articles.title: Retroid's $69 second screen is ready for your favorite DS games
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Retroid has launched the Dual Screen Add-on, a clamp-on secondary screen compatible with Retroid's Pocket handhelds and other third-party devices. The add-on features a 5.5-inch AMOLED touchscreen, connects via USB-C, and supports pass-through charging, offering an extended display solution for gaming.

articles.title: Apple's New Design Language is Liquid Glass
articles.summary: Apple introduced Liquid Glass, a new design language featuring transparency and glass shine effects. This update will be applied across macOS, iPadOS, iOS, and other Apple software platforms, marking Apple's broadest design update.

articles.title: Target's exclusive coffee maker and espresso machine is on sale for 30% off
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Target is offering a sale on the Nespresso VertuoPlus Single-Serve Coffee Maker and Espresso Machine. This machine, designed for Nespresso Vertuo capsules, features Centrifusion technology for optimal extraction and an adjustable tray for various cup sizes. It includes a 40-ounce water tank, holds up to 10 used capsules, heats up in 15 seconds, and has an automatic shut-off function.

articles.title: Apple Unveils Liquid Glass, a New Design Language
articles.summary: Apple unveiled Liquid Glass, a new design language. This new design language changes the look and feel of Apple's OSes.

articles.title: Krutrim to launch of Agentic AI assistant Kruti
articles.author: TNN
articles.summary: Krutrim, an AI startup, is launching Kruti, India's first 'agentic AI assistant,' designed to proactively handle tasks with greater autonomy. Kruti will be a consumer-facing product and is expected to have multilingual interaction and localized functionality.

articles.title: AMD's Ryzen Z2 Extreme just brought AI to handhelds — should the competition be worried?
articles.author: Luke James
articles.summary: AMD has launched its Ryzen Z2 Extreme lineup, featuring a built-in AI engine capable of 50 TOPS, designed for handheld devices and ultra-portable laptops. Asus, Lenovo, and MSI are developing new devices based on the Z2 series. The Ryzen Z2 Extreme aims to deliver high-end gaming performance combined with AI capabilities.

articles.title: Google I/O 2025 Recap: The Only Features That Actually Matter
articles.author: Alex Barrientos
articles.summary: Google showcased new technologies at its annual developer conference, including improved video calls, AI for automating tasks, and enhanced shopping tools. These announcements suggest the introduction or updates to existing Google services, potentially making them easier to use.

articles.title: Get Your Dad One Thing That Does Everything
articles.author: Ambar Pardilla
articles.summary: The article highlights several new or multifunctional products suitable for Father's Day gifts.  Featured items include the Ninja Swirl, an ice-cream maker capable of producing various frozen desserts, and the Ninja Slushi, a dispenser for creating slushies and cocktails.  Additionally, the article mentions a Loftie+ membership offering guided meditations and horoscope readings and a floor fan by Lowe's which purifies the room.

articles.title: 27 Urban Outfitters Dresses You'll Wear All The Time
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: A selection of new dresses is available, including a smocked mini dress ($69), a button-down puff-sleeve mini dress ($59), and a keyhole cutout mini slip dress ($59). Other options include a floral bustier midi dress ($69) at UO and a black bubble hem mini dress ($24.99, originally $49+).

articles.title: Level AI Launches Naviant: The Future of AI Virtual Agents for Customer Experience
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Level AI has launched Naviant, a next-generation AI virtual agent designed for human-like conversations, aiming to transform customer engagement. Naviant features AgentIQ for actionable automation, DialogIQ for human-like conversations, and EnlightIQ for continuous CX Excellence, offering a unified solution to improve customer experience. Topcon has shared positive feedback on Level AI, stating they made more progress in four weeks than six months with another vendor.

articles.title: Commercialville.TV Launches Zip-Code Targeted Video Search Platform with Times Square Billboard Debut and Continuing National Broadcast TV Rollout via New to The Street
articles.author: Access Newswire
articles.summary: Commercialville.TV, a zip-code-targeted, video-based search engine, has officially launched. This platform combines hyper-local precision with advertiser-generated video content. The launch includes a Times Square billboard campaign and national television exposure via New to The Street across Fox Business and Bloomberg Television.

articles.title: Puratos and AMF Bakery Systems Launch Cutting-Edge Pilot Bakery Plant at Puratos USA Headquarters in Pennsauken, NJ
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Puratos, in collaboration with AMF Bakery Systems, launched a new pilot bakery plant at its U.S. Headquarters in Pennsauken, New Jersey. This facility aims to accelerate innovation for commercial bakeries by providing services such as recipe development, optimization, testing, and training. The plant allows bakeries to test and refine recipes, reduce trial-and-error in product development, and participate in trend sessions.

articles.title: Commercialville.TV Launches Zip-Code Targeted Video Search Platform with Times Square Billboard Debut and Continuing National Broadcast TV Rollout via New to The Street
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Commercialville.TV, a zip-code-targeted, video-based search engine, has launched with an integrated media campaign. The service combines hyper-local precision with advertiser-generated video content, allowing users to search for businesses within a specific zip code using video search results.

articles.title: OrderMyGear Announces Upcoming Launch of Presentations and Order Management Solution for Branded Merchandise Businesses
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: OrderMyGear (OMG) announced the upcoming launch of OMG Presentations and Order Management, a new solution for businesses selling branded merchandise. Slated for launch in Q3 2025, the solution provides tools to pitch new business and close deals faster. OMG has opened an early access waitlist for the new product.

articles.title: Shop the Korean beauty app that brings skincare and makeup brands NEVER sold in the US to you at amazing prices
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: YLESS has launched its app in the US, featuring over 1,000 Korean beauty products from 20 brands previously unavailable in America. The app offers a streamlined shopping experience with categories and product lines like 'Wink' (high-performance dupes) and 'First-Try' (adventurous products) including specific products like AVANJUNE Winter Camellia Serum and BLAC3 Blood Drop Lip Oil.

articles.title: Syndigo Named a Strong Performer by Independent Research Firm
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syndigo has been recognized as a 'Strong Performer' in The Forrester Wave™ Master Data Management Solutions, Q2 2025 report, receiving the highest possible score in the Product 360 domain criterion. The report highlights Syndigo's AI-driven enhancements and robust support for B2B party and other data domains within its MDM solution. These capabilities aim to provide a unified view of enterprise data, improved decision-making, and faster time to market for customers.

articles.title: Showcasing the First Offer Server for In-App Monetization: GoKart Unveils New Website
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: GoKart launched its redesigned website featuring the AdTech industry's first Offer Server for mobile monetization and in-app advertising. The Offer Server is a unified platform for managing in-app deals, tracking, routing, and optimizing offers in real time with built-in attribution and fraud protection. This platform aims to simplify campaign management and drive revenue growth.

articles.title: Chipotle set to release 'Adobo Ranch,' first new dip in 5 years
articles.author: CBS News
articles.summary: Chipotle is launching a new dipping sauce called Adobe Ranch on June 17. This is their first new sauce since 2020 and combines adobo pepper, sour cream, herbs, and spices. Chipotle Rewards members can try Adobe Ranch for free on launch day.

articles.title: The Kindle Scribe Just Hit Its Lowest Price Ever
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Amazon's second-generation Kindle Scribe, released in December 2024, is now available at its lowest price, offering a $100 discount on all storage options. The Kindle Scribe features a 10.2-inch, 300 ppi black-and-white display designed for comfortable reading and includes a stylus for note-taking and drawing.

articles.title: 26 Very Good Last-Minute Father's Day Gifts (That Are on Sale)
articles.author: Sam Daly
articles.summary: The article highlights Meta Ray-Bans with photo-snapping capabilities and Fitbit's Charge 6 as a top fitness tracker recommendation. Sonos also has a portable speaker that is recommended.

articles.title: Walmart to expand drone delivery to more states
articles.summary: Walmart is developing drone delivery services to expand its customer reach. This initiative aims to make drone delivery a tangible service for a broader customer base.

articles.title: Chipotle set to release first new dip, called Adobo Ranch, in 5 years
articles.author: Megan
articles.summary: Chipotle is launching a new dipping sauce called Adobe Ranch on June 17, its first new sauce flavor since 2020. The sauce, made with adobo pepper, sour cream, herbs, and spices, offers a smoky and spicy twist on traditional ranch. Chipotle Rewards members can try the Adobe Ranch for free on launch day.

articles.title: ROG Xbox Ally: Xbox reveal first ever handheld console
articles.summary: Microsoft will release the ROG Xbox Ally, an Xbox-branded handheld gaming device, at the end of 2025. This device allows gamers to play digital Xbox games and access their Game Pass subscription via the cloud. The ROG Xbox Ally is a collaboration between Microsoft and ASUS and will be available in two versions: the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X.

articles.title: Full-screen Xbox handheld UI is coming to all Windows PCs "starting next year"
articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.summary: Microsoft and Asus are co-developing the ROG Xbox Ally, a new handheld gaming device aiming to offer comprehensive game compatibility through a Windows-based system with a custom Xbox-branded user interface. Microsoft plans to extend this interface to other Ally handhelds, differentiating it from Valve's Steam Deck and SteamOS.

articles.title: Best Amazon deals: Score Apple AirPods for a record-low price and more
articles.summary: Amazon is offering deals on various products, including a Stanley tumbler at 40% off, Roomba robot vacuums at nearly 45% off, and a bestselling waterproof tote bag at its lowest price. Rare discounts are also available on Apple AirPods and iPads, and there is a mention of the Nintendo Switch 2 release.

articles.title: Walmart picks Houston for expanded drone delivery service
articles.author: John Egan
articles.summary: NoScrubs, an Austin-based home laundry pickup service, has expanded to Houston, offering same-day laundry service using local laundromats. The service starts at $40 for 20 pounds and a basic monthly subscription costs $60 for two pickups, with all services using hypoallergenic detergents. To celebrate the launch, NoScrubs is offering a 50% discount off the first two months with the code CULTUREHOUSTON.

articles.title: Our handpicked Father's Day gifts on Amazon any dad will love for under £50
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a variety of Father's Day gift options, including a Cheese & Lager Gift Hamper, a Guinness gadget for draught-poured taste, and a smartwatch with fitness tracking. Other options include BOSS Bottled Unlimited Eau de Toilette, an electric shaver with 4D floating heads, and an affordable Nespresso machine with coffee pods.

articles.title: ASUS and Microsoft Break Gaming's Biggest Rule: ROG Xbox Ally Handheld Gaming Devices
articles.author: Al Landes
articles.summary: Microsoft and ASUS announced the ROG Xbox Ally and Ally X handheld gaming devices, with the ROG Xbox Ally featuring AMD's Ryzen Z2 A processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB storage, while the Ally X boasts the Ryzen AI Z2 Extreme chip, 24GB RAM, and 1TB storage. These handhelds offer a unified gaming experience across Xbox, Game Pass, Steam, and other storefronts.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Leaks: Price, Launch Date, Design, Camera, Specifications And More, What To Expect Next Month
articles.author: Shubham Arora
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 in early July. The new foldable device will feature a sleeker design, potentially including a titanium backplate, a larger main screen (up to 8.2 inches), and a refined cover display (6.5 inches). Camera upgrades may include a 200MP main camera, and it's expected to be powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, running on One UI 8 based on Android 16.

articles.title: Glossier's Body Butter Is 25 Percent Off for Strategist Readers
articles.author: Sam Daly
articles.summary: Glossier offers 25% off its body butter, scented with the You fragrance, until Sunday night with the code STRATCDY. The body butter formula is vegan, cruelty-free and contains shea butter and jojoba oil.

articles.title: Xbox ROG Ally vs. Steam Deck: Which Handheld Wins?
articles.author: Michael Beckwith
articles.summary: Microsoft unveiled the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X, new handheld devices developed in collaboration with Asus. The ROG Xbox Ally features an AMD Ryzen Z2 A Processor and a 60Wh battery, offering improvements over the existing Asus ROG Ally, despite sharing similar specs like 16GB RAM and 512GB storage.

articles.title: Chipotle introduces new dip as ‘bold new flavor'
articles.author: Carlos Mathis
articles.summary: Chipotle is launching a new sauce called Adobo Ranch, starting June 17, at locations across the U.S. and Canada. The Adobo Ranch is described as a smoky and spicy twist on ranch, made of adobo pepper, sour cream, and various herbs and spices. Chipotle Rewards members can receive a free offer for the new sauce with a minimum purchase of $5 on the first day.

articles.title: Xbox handheld console is here. Meet the Xbox Ally's
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Microsoft has unveiled two new handheld gaming devices: the Xbox Ally and the Xbox Ally X. The Xbox Ally X features AMD's AI Z2 Extreme processor and will launch with a redesigned, handheld-friendly version of the Xbox App integrating various PC game libraries. Both devices are expected to debut during the holiday season.

articles.title: Lava Storm Play and Storm Lite launching in India on June 13
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Lava is launching its new smartphones, the Storm Play and Storm Lite, in India on June 13th. The Storm Play features the MediaTek Dimensity 7060 chipset and dual 50MP cameras, while the Storm Lite runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 6400 processor, also with dual 50MP cameras. The devices will be exclusively available on Amazon India.

articles.title: A Switch 2 YouTube app is coming ‘soon'
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: TeamYouTube announced they are collaborating with Nintendo to bring YouTube to the Switch 2. This follows the release of the Switch 2 on June 5th, which includes an improved screen and processor. Other streaming apps from the original Switch, like Hulu and Crunchyroll, are currently incompatible with the Switch 2.

articles.title: New Look £35 dress 'similar to Chanel' and 'effortlessly stylish'
articles.author: Husna Anjum
articles.summary: New Look is selling the Black Gingham Check Strappy Midi Dress for £34.99. The dress is a black and white gingham design, slim fit with adjustable straps, square neck, and cut out back. It is available in sizes 12-22.

articles.title: What to Buy at ALDI in June: 9 New Products to Add to Your Cart, from Bulgogi Beef to Mini Ice Cream Cones
articles.author: Taryn Pire
articles.summary: ALDI is introducing nine new food products. These include wild-caught tuna steaks, hot honey pepperoni pizza, lemon basil ravioli, Hawaiian sweet rolls chips, Korean BBQ marinated beef, non-alcoholic sparkling beverage, lemon cake, lemon bar almonds, and mini ice cream cones. These items will be available in ALDI stores throughout June, with prices ranging from $2 to $6.

articles.title: Sobot Reveals 'AI-First' Strategy for Delivering Human-Like Customer Service
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sobot unveiled its 'AI-First' strategy, enhancing Sobot AI with five pillars: Omnichannel AI, Scenario-Based AI, Multi-Faceted AI, Generative AI, and Secure AI. This aims to create an experience-led, easy-to-use, and efficiency-driven customer contact solution.

articles.title: This is the best vacuum I've ever used – but one thing left me in tears
articles.author: Abigail Hunt
articles.summary: SwitchBot introduced the K10+ Pro combo, which consists of a robot vacuum and a cordless stick vacuum. The cordless vacuum is lightweight and effective for quick cleanups, while the robot vacuum maps the house precisely, avoids obstacles, and empties its dustbin automatically. The system also includes a mopping function and app connectivity for scheduling.

articles.title: Microsoft cuts the Windows 11 bloat for Xbox handhelds
articles.author: Richard Speed
articles.summary: Microsoft, in partnership with ASUS, unveiled the Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X handhelds. These handhelds run a slimmed-down version of Windows 11 optimized for gaming, allowing users to enhance the gaming experience by jettisoning unnecessary parts of the OS. This optimization also reduces idle power usage and frees up memory for games.

articles.title: EY merges design, creative, CX and AI services into EY Studio+
articles.author: Aaron Baar
articles.summary: EY is launching EY Studio+, a new umbrella for its creative services. This suite will focus on using AI and acquired specialist businesses to design and launch new products and services. It aims to transform customer experiences, create valuable customer connections, and transform marketing operations for clients.

articles.title: Clutch Launches First Permanent Customer Hub in CF Markville Mall
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Clutch, Canada's online used car retailer, is opening its first Customer Hub inside Cadillac Fairview Markville Mall. The Customer Hub will serve as a dedicated pick-up and drop-off point for customers buying or selling through Clutch.ca, offering on-site support from Clutch experts, guided digital shopping, and customer education.

articles.title: Krisp Launches All-in-One Voice Productivity Platform for Contact Centers
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Krisp launched its real-time Voice AI Platform for call centers at CCW Vegas. This platform provides AI Noise Cancellation, AI Accent Conversion, AI Live Interpreter, and AI Agent Assist tools.

articles.title: NESCAFÉ® REDEFINES CLASSIC SUMMER DRINK WITH ESPRESSO LEMONADE HACK
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NESCAFÉ and SWOON are launching a limited-edition Espresso Lemonade kit featuring NESCAFÉ Espresso Concentrate Black and SWOON Classic Lemonade, available starting June 13, 2025. The kit provides consumers with a ready-made solution to create the trendy Espresso Lemonade drink at home.

articles.title: Does Walmart do drone delivery in New Jersey? What to know about expansion
articles.author: Damon C. Williams
articles.summary: Walmart is expanding its drone delivery system to Atlanta, Charlotte NC, Houston, Orlando, and Tampa FL, with 150,000 deliveries completed since 2021. Amazon has also launched its own drone delivery system, increasing competition in the market.

articles.title: Glance AI bags EEPC award
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Glance AI is introducing advanced generative AI technology, revolutionizing e-commerce. This represents a new product launch in the e-commerce technology space.

articles.title: Festival beauty essentials 2025, from Glastonbury to Download and more
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: The article highlights essential personal care and styling products like dry shampoo, SPF (sun protection factor) items, and cordless hair tools. These categories represent items recently introduced or updated by companies in the beauty and personal care sectors.

articles.title: If You're Kinda Frustrated By Your Lack Of Organization, These 38 Things Will Help You Declutter Your Whole Life
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: The article introduces a variety of new organizing products designed for different home spaces like pantry, fridge, bathroom, desk etc. These products include organizers for pantries, drawers, cables, fridges, batteries, handbags, spices, leggings, bedsheets, cleaning tools, documents, nail polish, water bottles, shoes, shower supplies, car essentials, bakeware, stuffed animals, t-shirts, vacuums, K-Cups, cutlery, and fridge storage. The products aim to enhance convenience and streamline the way you handle clutter.

articles.title: Learn 5 reasons why you should have a TV from Samsung's new Vision AI line
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Samsung launched its new line of Samsung Vision AI televisions in June 2025, targeting Latin America and the Caribbean. The 2025 models include Neo QLED, QLED, OLED, and The Frame, featuring advanced AI for image and sound optimization. These TVs offer interactive features like Generative Wallpaper and Karaoke AI, alongside SmartThings integration for smart home control.

articles.title: 5 skincare gifts under £50 to treat your dad with this Father's Day
articles.author: Niamh Kirk
articles.summary: Bulldog offers the Original Morning Routine kit, containing body wash, deodorant, shampoo, and moisturizer. Nivea provides the MEN Feeling Ultimate Gift Set, including shower gel, face wash, moisturizing crème, face scrub, and anti-perspirant. Clarins presents the Men Energizing Collection featuring cleansing gel and shower gel.

articles.title: Woods Blasts Rhodes: WWE Star's Shocking Endorsement!
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: Minute Maid partnered with WWE star Cody Rhodes due to his pre-existing brand recognition. WWE is shown to be increasing its focus on individual star power, prioritizing those with established external profiles, when selecting sponsorship opportunities. This suggests a strategic shift within WWE towards valuing and leveraging individual branding for lucrative endorsements.

articles.title: 6 high-tech Father's Day gifts that show you really care
articles.author: Kurt Knutsson
articles.summary: Lenovo introduces the Yoga 9i 2-in-1, a versatile laptop with a touchscreen, Intel processor, and AI-enhanced performance. Dreame launches the Z1 Pro Cordless Robotic Pool Cleaner, featuring powerful suction, AI mapping, and remote control for effortless pool maintenance.

articles.title: I tested this rugged phone and it's smarter than I expected thanks to AI
articles.author: Alastair Jennings
articles.summary: Blackview introduces the BL7000, a rugged smartphone featuring a 50-megapixel camera with a Samsung JN1 sensor and AI-powered apps for generating video, music, and images. The phone runs DokeOS 4.1 based on Android 15, with access to the Play Store. The main selling point of BL7000 is its AI potential.

articles.title: This mini PC isn't flashy - but after extensively testing it, I'd still recommend it for business
articles.author: Alastair Jennings
articles.summary: NiPoGi is launching the E3B 2025 Edition, a mini PC designed for business use. It features a plain black exterior, six USB Type-A ports, and a Ryzen 5 CPU that makes it reliable and compatible with standard business peripherals and equipment. It is designed for optimal use with Microsoft Office applications.

articles.title: ‘Inconceivable even three years ago': hands-on with Xbox's flashy new handheld console
articles.author: Alyssa Mercante
articles.summary: Microsoft has announced the Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X handheld consoles, co-branded with Republic of Gamers. The Xbox Ally X, features a 7-inch 1080p touchscreen, 24GB of RAM, 1TB SSD storage, and an AI Z2 chip, offering access to Xbox Game Pass and PC games. Gears of War: Reloaded, a remastered version, is launching on 26 August and is playable on the new console.

articles.title: There's a New Haircare Brand at Walmart — and Everything Is $12
articles.author: Michelle Rostamian
articles.summary: Cloud Haircare has introduced a new line of high-performance haircare products focused on providing accessible, moisture-infusing formulas for all hair types. The products are priced under $12 and available at Walmart, allowing customers to achieve salon-worthy results without luxury prices.

articles.title: டிவிஎஸ் ஆர்பிட்டர்.. புதிய தொடக்கநிலை எலெக்ட்ரிக் ஸ்கூட்டர்?
articles.summary: TVS might name its new electric scooter 'Orbiter', suggesting an upcoming release of a new product in the electric vehicle market.

articles.title: Nando's to open first Australian drive-thru in major city, giving away free chicken
articles.author: Alexandra Feiam
articles.summary: Nando's is launching its first drive-thru restaurant in Roxburgh Park, Melbourne, Australia, on June 10th. To celebrate the launch, customers can get free quarter chicken and chips on the day. The company plans to open 25 new restaurants across Australia and New Zealand in the next three years.

articles.title: China's top drone maker DJI comes down to earth with launch of robotic cleaner
articles.author: South China Morning Post
articles.summary: DJI is expected to launch a vacuum cleaning robot. This move is predicted to intensify competition in the robotic cleaner market in China.

articles.title: Walmart challenges consumer perceptions with ‘Who Knew?' campaign
articles.author: Jessica Deyo
articles.summary: Walmart has launched a new marketing campaign called 'Walmart. Who Knew?' featuring actors Walton Goggins and Stephanie Beatriz to highlight features like Express Delivery and enhanced Walmart+ membership benefits. The campaign aims to challenge consumer perceptions about Walmart by showcasing the retailer's capabilities.

articles.title: Snail vibrator review: the dual stimulation sex toy is a must try
articles.author: Kayla Kibbe
articles.summary: The 'snail vibe' is a new sex toy featuring dual stimulation with internal and external motors. It comes in two models: the Gizi, a compact option, and the OG/Curve, with a longer shaft. The toy is designed to provide clitoral and G-spot stimulation, touting a 'slide and roll' technology for a unique experience.

articles.title: Buzzed about new cafe in Newcastle with queues out the door forced to shut weeks after opening
articles.author: Simon Duke
articles.summary: Sunday cafe launched a new branch in Newcastle in early May, offering colourful machas, Acai bowls, and pancakes. Due to agent disputes, Sunday temporarily closed its Newcastle location a month after opening, but the owner plans to reopen soon.

articles.title: QuikTrip, not happy with the dust its competitors already are eating, upgrades drinks
articles.author: Carrie Rengers
articles.summary: QuikTrip has introduced updated beverage stations at select Wichita locations. The new stations feature digital touch screens for customized tea options, new technology for frozen drinks allowing flavor mixing, and improved fountain drink systems to reduce congestion. The drink station conversions began in Wichita on June 1 and are scheduled to be completed by late summer.

articles.title: Next's new 'super soft' £59 sweatshirt with an 'empowering' message for summer
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next has introduced a new 'super soft' sweatshirt for summer, designed by Never Fully Dressed. The Never Fully Dressed Cotton Embroidered Sweatshirt is priced at £59 and features an 'empowering' message with the word 'Hope' embroidered on the front and additional designs on the back. The sweatshirt is available in three colors and sizes six to 26.

articles.title: Supercars Archives
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Tommykaira developed the Zzii, a prototype car featuring a mid-engine RB26 and a McLaren F1-inspired silhouette. The Zzii was conceived to challenge the Porsche Carrera GT, but it never reached production.

articles.title: Carvana Customer Was Impressed With His Car-Buying Experience With The Company. – ‘Wonderful people, explained everything.'
articles.author: Matthew Gilligan
articles.summary: A customer shared his positive experience with Carvana's car-buying service on TikTok. He highlighted the company's wonderful staff, transparent explanations, a clean car, and the peace of mind provided by the warranty. He expressed his satisfaction with the service within the first week of his purchase.

articles.title: Next's £26 capri jeans can be 'dressed up or down' for work and weekends
articles.author: Nicole Haynes
articles.summary: Next has introduced Authentic Denim Cropped Capri Jeans, priced at £26. These versatile jeans are available in multiple colors and sizes, including regular, tall, and petite fittings. They are made from a blend of cotton, recycled polyester, viscose, and elastane and have received generally positive feedback.

articles.title: Next's £26 capri jeans that are 'smart enough to wear to work'
articles.author: Zoe Chamberlain
articles.summary: Next is offering their Authentic Denim Cropped Capri Jeans for £26, available in various colors and sizes with a comfortable, stretchy denim blend. New Look offers Kick Flare Cropped Jeans at £29.99 in light or dark blue hues. Amazon also features Roman Jeggings, discounted from £25 to £24 with a wide range of colors.

articles.title: UK Creating New Digital Platform For Public Sector Tech Buying
articles.author: Thom Carter
org: Department for Science, Innovation, and Technology
articles.summary: The UK Government is launching the 'National Digital Exchange' (NDX) platform to streamline technology procurement for the public sector. The NDX platform will allow public sector teams to access pre-approved tech deals and utilizes an AI-powered engine to match them with suppliers, aiming to improve efficiency and transparency in government contracts.

articles.title: ஹூண்டாயின் புதிய 1.2 லிட்டர் டர்போ பெட்ரோல் இன்ஜின்.. முதலில் எந்தக் காரில் பயன்படுத்தப்பட இருக்கிறது தெரியுமா?
articles.summary: Hyundai is considering using its new 1.2 Litre Turbo Petrol Engine in the Bayon Crossover SUV. This suggests a potential application of the engine in a future vehicle model.

articles.title: I tried the 23-piece Morrisons Big Daddy breakfast - I couldn't eat it all
articles.author: Emilia Bona
articles.summary: Morrisons has reintroduced their 'Big Daddy' breakfast in their cafes, available from June 2 to June 15. This large 23-item breakfast is priced at £10 and includes items like bacon, sausages, hash browns, black pudding, eggs, beans, mushrooms, and toast. It is marketed as a way to celebrate Father's Day.

articles.title: Microsoft allies with ASUS for a handheld Xbox
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Microsoft, in partnership with ASUS, is introducing the Xbox Ally and Xbox Ally X handheld gaming devices. The Xbox Ally X features a Ryzen Z2 Extreme processor, 24GB RAM, and 1TB storage, while the Xbox Ally includes a Ryzen 2A processor, 16GB RAM, and 512GB storage. Both devices have a seven-inch 1080p screen with 120Hz, an Xbox app for accessing the Xbox library, and will have access to other apps such as Discord and Battlenet.

articles.title: Xbox handheld that runs PlayStation games? ROG Ally's surprise reveal breaks the internet
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Microsoft and ASUS unveiled the ROG Xbox Ally and its advanced version, the Ally X, at the Xbox Games Showcase 2025. These handheld gaming devices, powered by Windows 11, offer access to Xbox Game Pass titles, Steam games, and even PC versions of PlayStation games. The ROG Xbox Ally family is slated for release in holiday 2025, with prices rumored to range between $599–$999 USD.

articles.title: Lerica Renunciation: A United Europe Opportunity
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: The US government is initiating a new industrial policy with significant investment and incentives, aiming to challenge dominant companies such as potentially ASML or a major Chinese tech firm, in sectors like semiconductors, AI, or green energy. This initiative draws inspiration from Europe's creation of Airbus to rival Boeing, suggesting a strategy to foster competition and innovation.

articles.title: ThinkROI gets programmatic mandate for Hamilton Sciences' brand portfolio
articles.author: Bestmediainfo Bureau
articles.summary: ThinkROI has secured the programmatic advertising mandate for Hamilton Sciences' portfolio of personal care brands. The mandate includes media planning for the recently launched Denver Face Wash range, along with other brands like ENVY, Vanesa, and Pour Home.

articles.title: George Ansell and his relentless journey of growing security trade products
articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.summary: In 2023, George Ansell launched Stealth Locking under Security Trade Products Ltd. (STP), offering premium, design-led, fire-rated security solutions. Following this, in 2024, he introduced SWL Security Wholesale (Epping) Limited, a multi-brand trader counter designed to complement STP's single-brand approach, offering a range of security products.

articles.title: Honor 400 5G launched from Mt Everest
articles.summary: Honor has launched the Honor 400 5G series smartphone, featuring a 200MP camera, AI capabilities, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, 6000mAh battery, and 100W fast charging. Pre-booking has started, with the first sale scheduled for June 16.

articles.title: Blunt Launches Soundwave Series Under IND 2000 – Where Design Meets Powerful Sound
articles.author: Vitamins
articles.summary: Go5 Incorporation's electronics brand BLUNT has launched the Soundwave Series, a range of four portable Bluetooth speakers designed for millennials. These water-resistant speakers feature Bluetooth 5.4 connectivity and long battery life, aimed at delivering a powerful audio experience.

articles.title: KT엠모바일, 생활 밀착형 실속 ‘올리브영·다이소' 요금제 출시
articles.summary: KT M Mobile launched the new 'Olive Young, Daiso' plan, which provides a 5,000 won discount coupon for Olive Young or Daiso every month. The 'All-You-Can-Eat' plan consists of four types with monthly data options and coupon benefits. The company aims to introduce various products in line with changing consumer trends.

articles.title: Inuvo: AI Unlocks Ad Intent
articles.author: ABPG Staff
articles.summary: Inuvo has introduced the IntentKey Platform, a self-serve interface that empowers advertisers with direct access to Inuvo's AI-driven audience modeling. This platform allows users to generate audience models by inputting a URL or text prompt, facilitating the exploration of AI-inferred demographics, geo data, sentiment trends, and model size. The intent is to provide precise, real-time solutions that don't rely on personal data.

articles.title: ThinkROI wins digital programmatic mandate for Hamilton Sciences' brand portfolio
articles.author: Adgully Bureau
articles.summary: ThinkROI has secured the digital programmatic mandate for Hamilton Sciences, which involves managing the digital strategy and execution for brands like Denver and ENVY. This includes promoting the newly launched Denver Face Wash range and employing programmatic advertising with precision targeting to reach consumers across multiple channels. The aim is to build brand visibility and drive growth through data-backed media interventions.

articles.title: The End of Static Products: Jellybean and Callaway Demonstrate Future of Customer Engagement Technology
articles.summary: Jellybean introduces a technology to enhance physical products with digital experiences, exemplified by their collaboration with Callaway Arts & Entertainment on the launch of a blockchain-enhanced memoir, 'The Unconquerable Game.' This memoir includes AI-narrated audiobooks, archival videos, and interactive content, aiming to transform the traditional publishing model into an ongoing engagement platform.

articles.title: 44 Satisfying Impulse Buys With Zero Buyer's Remorse
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Catrice introduced "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, a lightweight concealer with hyaluronic acid and shea butter. Clinique launched Almost Lipstick Tinted Lip Balm in Black Honey, offering a buildable gloss. E.l.f. Cosmetics released a lash-extending tubing mascara with lightweight technology. Anua launched heartleaf pore-clearing cleansing oil. Kahi released Wrinkle Bounce Hydrating Multi-Balm. Cremo launched moisturizing body wash inspired by Baccarat Rouge 540 scent. Mise En Scene launched hair serum made with nourishing oils. There is also floral-infused cuticle oil and antibacterial paper soap sheets.

articles.title: One Absent Nintendo Switch 2 Launch Title is a Real Head-Scratcher
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Nintendo Switch 2, eight years after the original Nintendo Switch.

articles.title: 微软：ROG Xbox Ally 系统体验明年将登陆更多 Windows 掌机
articles.author: IT之家
articles.summary: Microsoft is expanding its 'Xbox full screen experience,' a Windows version optimized for handheld devices, beyond the ROG Ally and ROG Ally X. This optimized experience will be available for existing ROG Ally devices and, starting next year, will extend to other Windows handhelds such as Lenovo Legion Go and MSI Claw, improving gaming performance and efficiency.

articles.title: 26 Things You'll Want If You're Living Alone For The First Time And Can't Have Your Parents Just Fix/Solve Everything
articles.author: Danielle Healy
articles.summary: The article introduces various new products designed to simplify household tasks and solve common problems. It features items like the WD-40 pen for precision lubrication, Dawn Powerwash spray for eliminating dish pre-soaking, and Anyday starter set for cooking nutritious meals in the microwave. Additionally, it includes solutions like a plant-based cooking oil solidifier for safe disposal of used oil.

articles.title: From idea to income: How does print on demand work?
articles.summary: The article introduces Print on Demand (POD), a business model that allows selling custom products without upfront inventory costs. Entrepreneurs can sell custom t-shirts, mugs, tote bags, wall art, and other creative items through a POD partner who manages printing and shipping.

articles.title: iQOO Z10 Lite 5G launch date confirmed: Expected to come with MediaTek Dimensity 7300, 6,000mAh battery, 50 MP dual rear camera, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: iQOO is launching the iQOO Z10 Lite 5G in India on June 18. The phone is expected to have a 6.5-6.7 inch IPS LCD screen, a Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 chip, a 6,000mAh battery, and a 50-megapixel dual-rear camera. The iQOO Z10 Lite 5G is anticipated to be priced at Rs 9,999.

articles.title: 25 Target Items Perfect For Carry-On Only Travelers
articles.author: Emma Kershaw
articles.summary: The Honest Company offers a mini bottle of hand sanitizer spray.

articles.title: E-Land announced on the 9th that it will hold a "first-come, first-served super special price" promo..
articles.author: Lee Sunhee
articles.summary: E-Land is offering up to 80% off on small home appliances at its offline stores nationwide every weekend in June through a "first-come, first-served ultra-special price" promotion. This includes items like blenders, multi-cookers, electric grills, and hairdryers sold at discounted prices, aiming to attract customers to their physical stores.

articles.title: ROG Xbox Ally: Asus & Microsoft Handheld Console
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Asus and Microsoft are launching the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X handheld gaming devices targeting the 2025 holiday season. The devices feature a new Windows interface optimized for gaming, with the ROG Xbox Ally X being the more powerful variant featuring an AMD Ryzen AI Z2 Extreme processor, 24GB RAM and 1TB of storage. The ROG Xbox Ally is expected to launch between €500-€600, while the ROG Xbox Ally X could cost around €900.

articles.title: 28 Beauty Products Boasting 'Whoa'-Worthy Before And Afters That'll You Convince You To Click 'Add To Cart'
articles.author: Samantha Wieder
articles.summary: Several companies have introduced or are promoting new beauty products. Essence promotes its Lash Princess mascara for dramatic lashes, while Revlon has a hot air brush for drying and styling hair. L'Oreal Paris has a rinse-out lamellar water treatment. Dior sells a lip glow oil infused with cherry oil, and CeraVe offers a retinol serum.

articles.title: Nykaa has big plans for house of brands business
articles.author: Sneha Shah
articles.summary: Nykaa is focusing on expanding its house of brands business, which includes Nykaa Cosmetics, Kay Beauty, and Wanderlust. The company is venturing into new categories, including perfumes, with plans to build strong customer brands in each segment.  The house of brands business has already reached a GMV run rate of ₹2,100 crore, more than doubling in size in two years.

articles.title: 34 Trusted Products To Buy If You're Over TikTok Shop
articles.author: Emma Lord
articles.summary: Olay introduced Super Serum Body Wash containing niacinamide, shea butter, and collagen peptides. Laneige launched Neo Blurring Powder, designed to absorb oil and blur pores. Sally Hansen released Insta-Dri nail polish for quick touch-ups.

articles.title: I Played With the ROG Xbox Ally, the Upcoming Xbox Handheld
articles.author: Sean Booker
articles.summary: Microsoft has revealed two new Xbox handheld consoles, the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X. These devices run Windows 11 and feature integration with the Xbox ecosystem, allowing users to download games, remote play, and stream from the cloud. The devices are expected to launch in time for the winter holidays with pricing and release dates to be announced.

articles.title: These 38 Things Are Even Better Than Your Old Faves
articles.author: Iman Sakrani
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduced a moisturizing "Squeeze Me" lip balm with hyaluronic acid. Wet & Forget launched a bleach-free shower cleaner. Trader Joe's offers reusable GripStic bag sealers. Hatch launched Restore 2 to mimic natural light transitions for better sleep. Rocketbook launched Fusion reusable notebook with seven different templates.

articles.title: Jinro soju named world's best-selling spirit for 24 consecutive years
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: Hitejinro Co. announced the introduction of a new flavor for its flagship soju brand Jinro.

articles.title: Why Tinder Is Rebuilding Its Dating App Experience For Gen Z
articles.author: Dan Gingiss
articles.summary: Tinder's incoming CEO, Spencer Rascoff, is focusing on improving user experience by introducing new features, utilizing AI, and emphasizing safety to attract Gen Z. Tinder has been testing a 'double dating' feature that enables users to team up with friends and match with other pairs for dates. These initiatives are aimed at adapting to changing user preferences and moving away from a hookup culture.

articles.title: The Most Promising Startups From The First-Ever YC Spring Batch
articles.author: Dasha Shunina
articles.summary: Y Combinator's spring batch (X25) startups are launching new AI-driven products and services across various industries. Cactus introduces an AI Copilot for solopreneurs, Text.ai offers AI-powered features within chat platforms, Approval AI streamlines the mortgage process, Better Auth provides a comprehensive authentication solution for TypeScript developers, Den aims to make AI agents accessible for knowledge workers, and SynthioLabs is building voice AI medical reps for the pharma industry. These companies are set to present their ideas on Demo Day, showcasing how they are reshaping industries with their innovative solutions.

articles.title: Agentic Commerce And EU VAT Compliance: When AI Buys For You
articles.author: Aleksandra Bal
articles.summary: Agentic commerce introduces a novel shopping method where AI agents manage purchases on behalf of users, streamlining the shopping process. Users set parameters for the agents, which then search for deals, make purchases, and handle payment, automating routine tasks. Gartner predicts that 33% of businesses will incorporate agentic AI by 2028.

articles.title: 의사로 하여금 ‘최고'가 되고 싶게 만드는 힘… 환자와 그 가족의 신뢰[아미랑]
articles.author: Health Chosun
articles.summary: Honda is releasing the new 2025 CRV model. Pricing details are anticipated.

articles.title: Chicken wine: UK shoppers spot new canned version of viral La Vieille Ferme - but ...
articles.author: The Scotsman
articles.summary: A summer favorite wine is now available for purchase in a can.

articles.title: After lab grown chicken, FDA approves lab-grown salmon for public consumption
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: The FDA has approved Wildtype's lab-grown salmon, making it the first cultivated fish to be served to the public. This cultivated salmon is now available on the menu at a Portland restaurant, marking the product's official launch.

articles.title: Sesen Launches with a Singular Mission: Advancing Life Sciences Globally Through Specialized Language Solutions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Sesen launched a next-generation language services company. This company aims to meet the complex demands of the life sciences.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney's used bathwater soap resold for insane amount after it sells out immediately. Check detail
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney collaborated with a men's personal care company. They launched a limited-edition soap called 'Sydney's Bathwater Bliss'.

articles.title: Explore Lethbridge app aims to cut through noise when looking for something to do
articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Tourism Lethbridge has officially launched its new Explore Lethbridge app. This app represents a new service offering from the organization.

articles.title: Sydney Sweeney's used bathwater soap resold for insane amount after it sells out immediately. Check details
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: Sydney Sweeney partnered with a men's personal care company. They launched a limited-edition soap called 'Sydney's Bathwater'. This launch introduces a new product to the market.

articles.title: The Right Move: Samsung Explains Why The Galaxy S25 Edge With Small Battery Is Not ...
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge is a new phone which has a smaller battery and lacks a telephoto lens, but retains other premium features.

articles.title: Trojan Battery Unleashes Long Range and Next-level Power with Lithium OnePack™ High Performance (HP)
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Trojan Battery Company launched the Trojan Lithium OnePack High Performance (HP), a new battery product expanding its Trojan Lithium OnePack family. The HP battery is described as the company's most powerful battery to date and a market-changing solution.

articles.title: The Nintendo Switch 2 Should Get Its Most Important App Soon
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nintendo launched the Switch 2, a new handheld gaming console. The console lacks a key app that is highly desired by users.

articles.title: PopOff Launches Dye-Free Hydration Freeze Pops with Electrolytes and B Vitamins
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: PopOff, a new company in the functional food and beverage sector, launched its line of dye-free hydration freeze pops. These freeze pops offer a clean-label alternative for consumers seeking functional hydration without artificial dyes.

articles.title: The new ColorBar is here, heralding an era of hyper-inclusive beauty
articles.author: Diya J Verma
articles.summary: ColorBar is launching ColorBar 2.0, featuring upgraded formulations, packaging, and a new consumer experience.  Upcoming product lines include a teen line, products for women over 60, a men's line, and a luxury perfume line.  New features and services in ColorBar stores will include engraving, customization, and interactive elements like a slot machine.
